page.title: 19WESTON MILL CEMETERY
page.content: {The gravestones vary in what they are made of.Some are ordinary stone,while others are of marble or granite.There are many different styles of grave_ stone _ hearts,crosses,books, scrolls, and elaborate arches.Some headstones even have pictures of the people who have died on them.The older Victorian gravestones are rather delapidated in appearance,and are larger and more ornate than modern_day stones.The verses on them are longer and more sentimental than the ones of today. {There are graves of service men dating back to the First World War. Amongst these,are two headstones of Germans, dated 1914 and 1915,on which are symbols shaped like the German Iron Cross.We assumed they were sailors killed in action.The Second World War graves include those of a Polish aircrew.
